languages.text: "Ты, видимо, приш{mf|ел|ла} из вселенной слабаков и тряпок. Мне отвратительна сама мысль, что мой двойник не только отказался от служения Хаосу, но и называл другом такое ничтожество как ты".

"You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."
languages.original_text: "Ты, видимо, приш{mf|ел|ла} из вселенной слабаков и тряпок. Мне отвратительна сама мысль, что мой двойник не только отказался от служения Хаосу, но и называл другом такое ничтожество как ты".

traits.locale_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of limp-wristed weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos, but also befriended a lowlife like you."

"You must have arrived from the universe of limp-wristed weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos, but also befriended a lowlife like you."

"You must have arrived from the universe of limp-wristed weaklings. I'm disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

"You must have arrived from the universe of limp-wristed weaklings. I'm disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

"You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

"You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

languages.text: « Vous devez arriver d'un univers de mauviettes sans poigne. La simple idée qu'un double de moi ait non seulement refusé de servir le Chaos, mais aussi fraternisé avec une vermine comme vous me donne la nausée. »
languages.original_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez arriver d'un univers de mauviettes sans poigne. La simple idée qu'un double de moi ait non seulement refusé de servir le Chaos, mais aussi fraternisé avec une vermine comme vous me donne la nausée. »

languages.text: «Debes de venir de un universo lleno de flojos enclenques sin agallas. Me repugna la idea de que una de mis contrapartidas no solo rechazó el poder del Caos sino que encima se hizo amigo de alguien tan débil como tú».
languages.original_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

traits.locale_text: «Debes de venir de un universo lleno de flojos sin agallas. Me repugna la idea de que una de mis contrapartidas no solo rechazó el poder del Caos sino que encima se hizo amigo de alguien tan débil como tú».

languages.text: “你那个世界里肯定到处都是软蛋和怂货。那个世界的我不仅没有侍奉混沌，居然还和你这样的软蛋交了朋友。一想到这个，我就觉得恶心。”
languages.original_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

traits.locale_text: “你那个世界里肯定到处都是软弱的怂货。那个世界的我不仅没有侍奉混沌，居然还和你这样的软蛋交了朋友。一想到这个，我就觉得恶心。”

languages.text: 「お前は、赤子と弱虫だけの宇宙から来たに違いない。俺の相棒が渾沌に仕えることを拒んだだけでなく、お前のような下等な連中と親交を結んでいたなんて、考えただけでもうんざりするな」
languages.original_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、手足が不自由な弱虫の宇宙から来たに違いない。俺の相棒が渾沌に仕えることを拒んだだけでなく、お前のような下等な連中と親交を結んでいたなんて、考えただけでもうんざりするな」

languages.text: "Ihr kommt wohl aus dem Universum der Luschen und Schwächlinge. Mich widert allein der Gedanke an, dass ein Pendant meiner selbst sich nicht nur geweigert hat, dem Chaos zu dienen, sondern sich auch noch mit Abschaum wie Euch angefreundet hat."
languages.original_text: "You must have arrived from the universe of milksops and weaklings. I am disgusted at the very thought that a counterpart of mine not only refused to serve Chaos but also befriended a lowlife like you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr kommt wohl aus dem Universum der laschen Schwächlinge. Mich widert allein der Gedanke an, dass ein Pendant meiner selbst sich nicht nur geweigert hat, dem Chaos zu dienen, sondern sich auch noch mit Abschaum wie Euch angefreundet hat."
